messages: You dream of a fox wandering at night.
While dreaming, you see lights in the darkness of a distant forest.
You dream of rain on a sunny day. For some reason it feels very pleasant.
In your dream you look into a pool of water and see a fox in your reflection.
You dream you are in the stars, you feel a sense of longing.
You have a lucid in which you are a fox stalking through the underbrush, it’s oddly…satisfying.
You dream of a playing trick on a boastful human.
You dream of a glistening white ball that makes you feel warm inside.
